10 template <typename VoxelType>
11 bool getSdfIfValid(const VoxelType& voxel, const FloatingPoint min_weight,
12  FloatingPoint* sdf);
13 
14 template <>
15 inline bool getSdfIfValid(const TsdfVoxel& voxel,
16  const FloatingPoint min_weight, FloatingPoint* sdf) {
17  DCHECK(sdf != nullptr);
18  if (voxel.weight <= min_weight) {
19  return false;
20  }
21  *sdf = voxel.distance;
22  return true;
23 }
24 
25 template <>
26 inline bool getSdfIfValid(const EsdfVoxel& voxel,
27  const FloatingPoint /*min_weight*/,
28  FloatingPoint* sdf) {
29  DCHECK(sdf != nullptr);
30  if (!voxel.observed) {
31  return false;
32  }
33  *sdf = voxel.distance;
34  return true;
35 }

37 template <typename VoxelType>
38 bool getColorIfValid(const VoxelType& voxel, const FloatingPoint min_weight,
39  Color* color);
40 
41 template <>
42 inline bool getColorIfValid(const TsdfVoxel& voxel,
43  const FloatingPoint min_weight, Color* color) {
44  DCHECK(color != nullptr);
45  if (voxel.weight <= min_weight) {
46  return false;
47  }
48  *color = voxel.color;
49  return true;
50 }
51 
52 template <>
53 inline bool getColorIfValid(const EsdfVoxel& voxel,
54  const FloatingPoint /*min_weight*/, Color* color) {
55  DCHECK(color != nullptr);
56  if (!voxel.observed) {
57  return false;
58  }
59  *color = Color(255u, 255u, 255u);
60  return true;
61 }
